volume_driver.description: Logical volume managment driver. Must be one of ``vxvm`` and ``lvm``.

disk_size.description: Size of Virtual Disk in Gigabytes.

ram.description: Size of RAM for Virtual Device in Megabytes.

cpus.description: Number of CPUs to be given to VM.

path.description: Path for VM image (Please ensure this path has appropriate space for the specified VM's).

forwarding_delay.description: Forwarding Delay in seconds between 0 and 300.

bridge_name.description: Bridge name, must begin with characters "br".

hostnames.description: hostnames of nodes to use for this clustered service.

item-type.description: A description of volume groups and file systems that live on them.

install_source.description: Path to the file delivered by package

default_gateway.description: Use this network's gateway as default route for the profile.

management_network.description: Name of the network to be used for litp management (pxe boot, puppet communication).

item-type.description: Base type for services (e.g. cobbler) modelled on the MS.

network_name.description: Network name for ip-range.This must be unique to each ip-range.

options.description: Properties for a pool server, for example 'iburst', 'prefer'.

server.description: Host address of a pool server.

item-type.description: an HA Cluster with HA is provided by Core MW

cli_timeout.description: Maximum time, in seconds, to wait for a cli command to execute

admin_op_timeout.description: Maximum time, in seconds, for administrative operations during a campaign

max_time_leaving_cluster.description: Maximum time, in minutes, to wait for a node to rejoin the cluster

campaign_reboot_timeout.description: Maximum time, in seconds, to wait for a node to reboot during a campaign

imm_command_timeout.description: Maximum time, in seconds, to wait for a IMM command to finish

quick_reboot.description: Set if BIOS is to be bypassed at boot time

item-type.description: A basename for an interface which is used in the naming of that interface
Base type for network addresses range.
A phase item, contains a set of tasks.

name.description: Name of package to install/remove.Needs to match the filename of the underlying RPM.

repository.description: Name of repository to get Package.

config.description: Handling of pre-existing configuration files. Must be either 'keep' or 'replace'.

release.description: Release number of package to install/remove.

item-type.description: Collection of software packages to install.

ksm_ksname.description: The name of the kickstart file.

manage_dns.description: It enables Cobbler's DHCP management features

puppet_auto_setup.description: It ensures that Puppet is installed during machine provision.

ksm_path.description: Location where the kickstart file is placed.

manage_dhcp.description: Allow Cobbler to manage a local DHCP server.

remove_old_puppet_certs_automatically.description: It ensures Cobbler removes old Puppet certs automatically.

sign_puppet_certs_automatically.description: It ensures Cobbler signs Puppet certs automatically.

ksm_selinux_mode.description: This is the selinux security policy within the kickstart file.
